title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.
lineList.cn: 神有治理之权，有威严可畏。他在高处施行和平。

lineList.en: Is there any number of his armies? and upon whom doth not his light arise?
lineList.cn: 他的诸军，岂能数算。他的光亮一发，谁不蒙照呢。

lineList.en: How then can man be justified with God? or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?
lineList.cn: 这样在神面前，人怎能称义。妇人所生的怎能洁净。

lineList.en: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
lineList.cn: 在神眼前，月亮也无光亮，星宿也不清洁。

lineList.en: How much less man, that is a worm? and the son of man, which is a worm?
lineList.cn: 何况如虫的人，如蛆的世人呢。
